title: Add SkelUlt logo and Enable/Disable follow button with animation

requirements.text: Add the SkelUlt logo (bold geometric text with cyan 'ULT' accent) to the top-left corner of the Layout component header, ensuring it is small in size and displays consistently in both light and dark modes

quotes: add the logo right now at top left, it should be small but same in light or dark mode

acceptanceCriteria: Logo appears in the top-left corner of the Layout header
Logo is small and does not overwhelm other header elements
Logo displays with consistent styling in both light and dark theme modes
Logo uses the generated image asset from frontend/public/assets/generated

requirements.text: Add an Enable button next to the like button on all videos in VideoCard component that allows users to follow/subscribe to the video creator's channel

quotes: add "Enable" button which is same as follow/subscribe button, this should appear next to the like button
"Enable" button should have animation after clicking, turning into "disable" from which people can unfollow/unsubscribe the channel

acceptanceCriteria: Enable button appears next to the like button on all video cards
Button text displays 'Enable' when the user is not following the video creator
Clicking the Enable button follows/subscribes to the video creator
Button smoothly animates and transitions to 'Disable' state after clicking

requirements.text: Implement smooth animation for the Enable/Disable button that transforms the button state from 'Enable' to 'Disable' on click with visual transition effects

quotes: "Enable" button should have animation after clicking, turning into "disable"

acceptanceCriteria: Button smoothly animates when transitioning between Enable and Disable states
Visual transition effects are consistent with the neon-inspired design theme
Animation completes within a reasonable timeframe (300-500ms)
Button remains interactive and responsive during and after animation

requirements.text: Implement Disable button functionality that allows users to unfollow/unsubscribe from the video creator's channel when clicked in the Disable state

quotes: turning into "disable" from which people can unfollow/unsubscribe the channel

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Disable button unfollows/unsubscribes from the video creator
Button smoothly animates back to 'Enable' state after unfollowing
Follow/unfollow action updates the user's follow list immediately (optimistic UI)
Follow state persists correctly after page refresh

constraints: Do not modify backend schema or main.mo actor file
Use existing follow system infrastructure from FollowButton component
Do not edit immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts, main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Creating a new follow system separate from the existing one
Implementing analytics or tracking for button interactions

required: SkelUlt logo with bold geometric text featuring dark gray 'SKEL' letters and cyan 'ULT' accent on transparent background, optimized for header display (skelult-logo.dim_200x60.png)
